summary: I believe that I can obtain the fundamentals in this important field. The courses I am studying will allow me to develop an international view on the future of communication. Given these fundamentals I can analyse the communication needs of any organisation, public sector, private sector or charity. The field of communication is evolving so rapidly into various means and channels and many organisations are struggling with how to get their message out.
